div.div: The young men who opened fire at Columbine High School, at the movie theater in Aurora, Colo., and in other massacres had this in common: they were video gamers who seemed to be acting out some dark digital fantasy. It was as if all that exposure to computerized violence gave them the idea to go on a rampage — or at least fueled their urges. But did it really?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YSFLCp&via=Digg&text=Shooting In The Dark

div.a: Tons Of New Info On Next Xbox Leaks

div.div: The next-generation Xbox—the one that will follow the still-popular Xbox 360—will run multiple games at once, require game installations, and will only work when a much-improved version of the popular but divisive Kinect sensor array is plugged in, according to a source who says he has access to development hardware.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X0i24h&via=Digg&text=Tons Of New Info On Next Xbox Leaks

div.div: Pope Benedict XVI made headlines today (Feb. 11) when he announced he was stepping down — something no pope has done since the Middle Ages. While that's big news, the Catholic Church has seen much more dramatic upheavals.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeMQx1&via=Digg&text=History's 10 Most Intriguing Popes

div.a: Leonardo's Notebook Digitized In All Its Befuddling Glory

div.div: The British Museum has been digitizing some of its prize pieces and they announced a new round of six artifacts had been completed including Beowulf, a gold-ink penned Gospel, and one of Leonardo Da Vinci's notebooks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WUoCbj&via=Digg&text=Leonardo's Notebook Digitized In All Its Befuddling Glory

div.a: The Family Photo That Was Left On The Surface Of The Moon

div.div: We’ve seen photography of the Moon, and photography taken on the Moon; people have even left photography gear up there. But this is the first we’ve heard of a photo from Earth, not only making it to the Moon, but staying there.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11C0iAF&via=Digg&text=The Family Photo That Was Left On The Surface Of The Moon

div.a: Doppelbangher Subreddit Lets Users Submit Porn Star Lookalikes For Women They Know

div.div: The subreddit, which has over 8,000 subscribers, allows users to submit photos of celebrities and–more typically–users’ friends so that others can find their porn star lookalikes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeV5sI&via=Digg&text=Doppelbangher Subreddit Lets Users Submit Porn Star Lookalikes For Women They Know

div.a: High School Girl Nails One-Handed Full-Court Bouncer

div.div: You’ve seen endless trick shot videos, no doubt. Like this one, for instance, which we said would end all awesome trick shot videos.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5g6nn&via=Digg&text=High School Girl Nails One-Handed Full-Court Bouncer

div.a: The Navy SEAL Who Killed Bin Laden Isn’t Really 'Screwed'

div.div: The problem seems to be that business can’t find these highly trained veterans, and the SpecOps veterans don’t know how to make themselves seen by would-be employers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDn6tq&via=Digg&text=The Navy SEAL Who Killed Bin Laden Isn’t Really 'Screwed'

div.a: The Incredible Truth About a Ship That Never Should Have Sailed

div.div: What was this vessel—a leaking replica built in 1960 for the film "Mutiny on the Bounty"—doing in the eye of Hurricane Sandy?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z5AADa&via=Digg&text=The Incredible Truth About a Ship That Never Should Have Sailed

div.a: The World Of Dog Plastic Surgery

div.div: Dog botox: the greatest thing for dog self-esteem since the neuticle businessweek.com/articles/... @BW

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z5vNBx&via=Digg&text=The World Of Dog Plastic Surgery

div.a: This Dog Beauty Pageant Was The Best Fashion Weekend Show

div.div: At the first annual NYC Doggies & Tiaras Pageant, cake-faced humans flaunted their long-suffering dogs in three categories: activewear, talent, and glamour.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XrkEIr&via=Digg&text=This Dog Beauty Pageant Was The Best Fashion Weekend Show

div.a: Algorithm Learns How To Revive Dead Languages

div.div: Now a computer has been taught to reconstruct lost languages using the sounds uttered by those who speak their modern successors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y7bhfa&via=Digg&text=Algorithm Learns How To Revive Dead Languages

div.a: Pope Benedict XVI Had An Official MySpace Playlist And It Was Totally Dope

div.div: Tupac and Fleet Foxes are pretty big in Vatican City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRyS4i&via=Digg&text=Pope Benedict XVI Had An Official MySpace Playlist And It Was Totally Dope

div.div: The digital remnants of the long since deleted world of Geocities are slowly being reborn, page by page, on Tumblr.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WF1Xl0&via=Digg&text=Geocities Rebirth On Tumblr

div.div: Porn is made for men. But it doesn’t have to be that way.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VPcuLT&via=Digg&text=Why Women Watch Porn

div.a: Model Hit By Plane Makes Comeback At Fashion Week

div.div: The fashion blogger and former model, who lost an eye and her left hand and suffered a brain injury when she accidentally walked into a moving propeller just over a year ago, has been making great strides in her recovery.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UZqPFl&via=Digg&text=Model Hit By Plane Makes Comeback At Fashion Week

div.a: Your Name Isn't As Rare As You Think It Is

div.div: You may think your name is pretty rare. But whether you’re a John or a Jocasta, a recent study finds that you will consistently rate your first name as rarer than other people would rate it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRL84Q&via=Digg&text=Your Name Isn't As Rare As You Think It Is

div.div: DOES HE GET TO KEEP THE HAT?
With his early exit, Benedict may salvage an uncertain legacy. Plus, he could get a hand in picking his successor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WUfuU9&via=Digg&text=The Perks Of An Ex-Pope

div.a: Madonna Keeps Posting Unflattering Pictures Of Herself On Instagram And It's Awesome

div.div: After flirting with Twitter last year, it seems that Madonna has decided to give herself over to Instagram.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xr8X4g&via=Digg&text=Madonna Keeps Posting Unflattering Pictures Of Herself On Instagram And It's Awesome

div.div: Even the geniuses at CERN use Comic Sans.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRUWMr&via=Digg&text=A Defense Of Comic Sans

div.a: Blackberry's Creative Director Alicia Keys Tweets From iPhone, Blames Hackers

div.div: If a tweet posted by Keys today is any indication, she may not be being that faithful to the Blackberry's new platform.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YSpIon&via=Digg&text=Blackberry's Creative Director Alicia Keys Tweets From iPhone, Blames Hackers

div.a: How Long Does It Take To Become A Millionaire In Different Countries?

div.div: How long would it take for an average person to earn that special sum?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xs82Rk&via=Digg&text=How Long Does It Take To Become A Millionaire In Different Countries?

div.a: A Sashimi Dish That Took 7 Years To Design

div.div: Chicago chef Curtis Duffy spent seven years working on a dish. Now it's finally ready to be served.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y6NpIu&via=Digg&text=A Sashimi Dish That Took 7 Years To Design

div.a: Twins' DNA Causes Trouble For French Police

div.div: Police who are investigating a series of sexual assaults in the southern French city of Marseille have arrested identical twin brothers. But which one of them did it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11ySNKR&via=Digg&text=Twins' DNA Causes Trouble For French Police

div.a: Seven New Yorkers Share Their Best And Craziest Dating Stories

div.div: Seven New Yorkers share their best, worst, and most comically horrifying stories of love, lust and a lack thereof.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14NApM4&via=Digg&text=Seven New Yorkers Share Their Best And Craziest Dating Stories

div.a: Intelligent Civilizations Rarer Than One In A Million

div.div: NASA’s Kepler mission has identified 2,740 planets orbiting other stars, but do any of them harbor intelligent life?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y58zVw&via=Digg&text=Intelligent Civilizations Rarer Than One In A Million

div.a: Mountain Dew Introduces A Breakfast Drink

div.div: In case you don't enjoy coffee, tea, or any of the other available energy drinks and sodas, Mountain Dew has a new breakfast drink they'd like you to try.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11BecmB&via=Digg&text=Mountain Dew Introduces A Breakfast Drink

div.div: How the five-letter word became a fast-food mantra.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4Sinm&via=Digg&text=The Fresh Wars

div.a: Kobe Bryant: Delete 'Your Gay' From Vocabulary

div.div: In April 2011, Kobe Bryant turned a bad game into a terrible week when he yelled “f**king f*gg*t” at an NBA referee after a technical foul call. On Sunday night, he took a different position.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VPNDSY&via=Digg&text=Kobe Bryant: Delete 'Your Gay' From Vocabulary

div.a: Alleged iPhone 5S Assembly Line Photos Leak

div.div: What's in store for the next iPhone?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WTJwr3&via=Digg&text=Alleged iPhone 5S Assembly Line Photos Leak

div.a: What Happens When You Aim A Projector At A Blizzard?

div.div: New York-based redditor Brian Maffitt (bmaffitt) aimed his video projector (which he says was playing the movie, The Lorax) at falling snow during the recent blizzard and noticed some really beautiful results.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xn7tYR&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Aim A Projector At A Blizzard?

div.a: The Man Who Killed Osama Bin Laden... Is Screwed

div.div: For the first time, the Navy SEAL who killed Osama bin Laden tells his story — speaking not just about the raid, but about the personal aftermath for himself and his family.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WTbSS8&via=Digg&text=The Man Who Killed Osama Bin Laden... Is Screwed

div.a: Amazing Photos Of Dolphins And Sharks Attacking Mackerel

div.div: British photographer Christopher Swann took these amazing shots of dolphins and sharks preying on mackerel of the coast of Azores.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YQsvhP&via=Digg&text=Amazing Photos Of Dolphins And Sharks Attacking Mackerel

div.a: Watch A Cobra Helicopter Crash After Chasing A Car On 'Top Gear'

div.div: When racing a car against a Cobra attack helicopter, it’s best not to have the helicopter crash after the finish line.
